Title: Unfulfilled Requests
Description:
I have heard the citizens of the Silken Ward are having trouble with a group of Ascended called the Pale Weavelashers.

The new ward is supposed to be a fresh start for citizens of the capital, at least that is the way the Queen tells it. In actuality it is a way for her to tighten her grip on those she distrust. 

Meet with my assistant Sum'latha. I sent her there ahead of time to gather information. She can fill you in on any details.
ObjectivesText: Meet with Sum'latha at the Silken Ward.
